title: Holidays & Events: O-bon (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the O-bon subcategory within Holidays & Events. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: O-bon is a period of honoring one's ancestors, so it's important to clean the family graves before welcoming their spirits.
cards.romaji: O-bon wa sosen o matsuru kikan nanode, sosen no rei o mukaeru mae ni o-haka o soji suru no wa taisetsu na koto desu.
cards.japanese: お盆は祖先を祭る期間なので、祖先の霊を迎える前にお墓を掃除するのは大切なことです。
